title: 'Octomom' Nadya Suleman gives bank customers a fright bank wearing terrifying headgear
text:
Nadya Suleman, aka 'Octomom', stunning onlookers at a local Wells Fargo Bank last week as she wearing a bizarre disguise

The mother-of-14, who shot to fame a decade ago after giving birth to octuplets through IVF – shielded her entire face beneath a dark piece of fabric, as she made her way to a local fitness center on October 18.

Nadya, 44, completed the oddball appearance with over-sized shades and a dark gray hat, before removing them only for her workout.

The following week, on October 21, she wore the identical costume to run her children to school… before heading to her local Wells Fargo Bank.

Locals confirmed she frequently runs errands in the bizarre outfit – but this is the first time she was seen inside the bank building.

Nadya Suleman, aka 'Octomom', stunning onlookers at a local Wells Fargo Bank last week as she wearing a bizarre disguise. One resident told DailyMail.com: 'She is always seen with her face and head covered, I'm surprised she's allowed to go in a bank dressed like that, it's over the top and makes people anxious'

'Nadya was in the bank for more than an hour in a glass room speaking about her finances and didn't once take the disguise off, said another onlooker

The mother-of-14 shot to fame a decade ago after giving birth to octuplets through IVF

'She looked more like Michael Jackson than a regular mom running errands,' saod one onlooker

Nadya, 44, completed the oddball appearance with over-sized shades and a dark gray hat, before removing them only for her workout

One resident told DailyMail.com: 'She is always seen with her face and head covered, I'm surprised she's allowed to go in a bank dressed like that, it's over the top and makes people anxious.

'Everyone knows who she is, so the irony is that it makes her stand out even more by acting so bizarrely.'

Another added: 'Customers in the bank couldn't believe what they were seeing, even the staff thought it was odd, she looked more like Michael Jackson than a regular mom running errands.

'Nadya was in the bank for more than an hour in a glass room speaking about her finances and didn't once take the disguise off.'

The sightings come as Nadya, who has been battling severe financial problems for years and once turned to shooting an X-rated movie, Octomom Home Alone, to pay the rent, is planning a fresh round of media appearances as she pens her autobiography.

Her financial situation has moderately improved in recent years as she claims she's been working full-time as a counselor.

The following week, on October 21, she wore the identical costume to run her children to school… before heading to her local Wells Fargo

The sightings come as Nadya, who has been battling financial problems for years is planning a fresh round of media appearances as she pens her autobiography

Nadia once turned to shooting an X-rated movie, Octomom Home Alone, to pay the rent

A worker from her local Ralph's grocery store confirmed she is rarely seen without her headgear and tries to keep her identity a secret from shoppers

Nadya is still living with her brood in a cramped three-bed rented condo in southern California — with some of her children being forced to sleep on the sofa

Nadya is still living with her brood in a cramped three-bed rented condo in southern California — with some of her children sleeping on the sofa.

The kids – who are aged between 10 and 17 — all attend local schools and she is seen frequently working out at her local gym during the day, where she climbs 40 miles a week on the StairMaster.

A worker from her local Ralph's grocery store confirmed she is rarely seen without her headgear and tries to keep her identity a secret from shoppers.

He said: 'She only buys organic food, vegan meals, and non-dairy products. Her younger kids sometimes run around the store and it's an effort to round them all up.

'It must be incredibly difficult for her, a real struggle trying to do it all on her own, she seems very paranoid and doesn't engage much.'

Nadia declined comment when approached by DailyMail.com.
description: Nadya Suleman, 44, stunning onlookers at a local Wells Fargo Bank last week as she wearing a bizarre disguise.
